channel.title: deploy java on 小夫子的随笔
channel.description: Recent content in deploy java on 小夫子的随笔

item.title: Ubuntu下部署jar
item.description: ubuntu 下部署jar 1.安装jdk 8 https://vitux.com/how-to-install-java-on-ubuntu-20-04/ sudo apt install openjdk-8-jdk openjdk-8-jre java -version cat >> /etc/environment <<EOL JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64 JRE_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64/jre EOL 2.运行jar https://blog.csdn.net/bencheng06/article/details/102491420 3.docker下部署jar https://blog.csdn.net/a835269079/article/details/102519209
